mapper.insert: INSERT INTO approval_orders (type, customer_id, opportunity_id, order_id, applicant_id, approver_id, content, requested_amount, status, feedback, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{type}, #{customerId}, #{opportunityId}, #{orderId}, #{applicantId}, #{approverId}, #{content}, #{requestedAmount}, #{status}, #{feedback}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id, type, customer_id, opportunity_id, order_id, applicant_id, approver_id, content, requested_amount, status, feedback, create_time, update_time FROM approval_orders

SELECT id, type, customer_id, opportunity_id, order_id, applicant_id, approver_id, content, requested_amount, status, feedback, create_time, update_time FROM approval_orders WHERE approver_id = #{approverId}

SELECT id, type, customer_id, opportunity_id, order_id, applicant_id, approver_id, content, requested_amount, status, feedback, create_time, update_time FROM approval_orders WHERE applicant_id = #{applicantId}
